$interpreted: Clark: Eh? Who are you? You don't look like the customers we were expecting...
Maria: Warning! Warning!
Clark: Hey! Wait a sec! Maria, it's not what you think——
Ru-yi: Wah! Why's she shaking so violently all of the sudden!?
Maria: Attack! Attack!
Clark: *sigh*...I'm sorry. Let me help.
Sophie: What's going on?
Sophie: She-she isn't moving...what the...?
Clark: I think she short-circuited. I'll just restart her. It shouldn't be an issue.
Maria: Restarting. Progress at 20%, 50%, 70%...
Maria: Master, good morning!
Clark: Master...ah, yes. I must tell her once more...
Maria: Warn—
Clark: Keep a safe distance!
Rune: He looks a little bit like Elio...but the hair simply isn't silver enough...
Clark: Who looks like me? That name...are you speaking of Elio from the Rune Academy?
Sophie: You know Elio!?
Ru-yi: Sophie, look! Her eyes are lighting up!
Maria: Based on Master's description, I've sketched this person's appearance, seen here.
Sophie: That's him! That's Elio!
Hanbei: Steam-based image processing? Is this Rune magic!?
Clark: No, this isn't Rune magic. She is...
Sophie: She is...what?
Clark: She...
Ru-yi: She?
Clark: Eh...
Clark: It's a little hard to explain...
Sophie: Eh...
Hutchinson: As for this fine lady's situation, perhaps it would be best if you came to our tent to rest for a while. That way we can talk about everything...
Ru-yi: Ya!! After all, we've got to try the black tea that Hutchinson prepared~
Hutchinson: Oh, please. This is expected of a gentleman.
Sophie: Plus, I've got to hear about what happened to Elio...
Clark: ...I see. Please, lead the way.
Clark: Maria, let's go.
Maria: Chu~~Chu~~~
Hutchinson: This fine lady's expressions and movements...they're exactly like a human's. It's amazing.
Sophie: So, Mrs. Maria is...a human?
Maria: Maria is currently searching.......I'm sorry, I do not have the appropriate information to respond to your question.
Maria: Am I human, Clark?
Rune: ...Clark...?
Clark: *sigh*...I just explained this to her on the way here. Clark is my name, Clark Shot.
Rune: Not...Master?
Clark: That's right. But after restarting her, she seems to have forgotten...Maria, we talked about personal space.
Sophie: Looks like you two get along very well.
Clark: Oh, geez. Don't get me started. As for Maria, I'm actually not too clear on her past.
Clark: So I'm afraid I don't have an answer for Sophie.
Clark: Before it got washed ashore, she was hanging out in the trash pile dumped by the ferry which goes to the Mechanical Territory.
Sophie: Wasn't that what the sailor was complaining about?
Clark: That's right. I originally hoped to catch the ferry to the Mechanical Territory.
Clark: But recently the ferry has been malfunctioning. After dumping the goods onboard, it just disappears...
Sophie: So what you're saying is that Maria is a...robot?
Clark: I'm not sure. The Mechanical Territory is closed off from the rest of the world. It's still a mystery.
Clark: I've heard that in the Desert Bazaar there lives a mechanical merchant who escaped from the Mechanical Territory.
Ru-yi: I know him! His son-in-law is so, so, so hot!
Clark: I used to have a teacher who wanted to study this merchant, but he managed to escape. As he should have...
Sophie: Teacher? ...so you and Elio are...?
Clark: ——We both studied at the Rune Academy, yes.
Clark: But I must be clear. I was not the exceptional student that Elio is. I was merely sitting in on classes. Not enough to do anything exceptional.
Maria: That's not true! Clark saved Maria. Clark is Maria's master!
Clark: Thank you, Maria. Now can you please let me go? I think I'm suffocating...
Hanbei: Looks like she's squeezed your face into another shape...can't tell if she wants to protect you or kill you...
Clark: Basically, as I was repairing her I accidentally started her up.
Clark: Since she was reset, she has no memories of the past. Plus, getting rid of her is a bit of a hassle. So...that's the way it is.
Sophie: Rune! Don't do that!
Sophie: I'm so sorry Maria, Rune doesn't mean anything by it. Your little bird isn't hurt, is it?
Maria: Its name is Chu Chu. Is Chu Chu hurt?
Clark: Maria, let me take a look.
Rune: I did bad...I'm sorry.
Clark: It's okay. The Rune bird I made may be simple, but it shouldn't break that easily.
Clark: Maria, there are a lot of people here. Why don't you put Chu Chu away?
Maria: Order received, Master Clark! Chu Chu, be a good little birdie!
Clark: *cough*...so if it's not too much, may I ask a question?
Clark: Why are you looking for Elio?
Sophie: Um...eh...
Clark: Is it because he's the adopted son of Headmaster Ceres? Or perhaps because he is the cousin of Queen Angelia?
Sophie: ......
Hutchinson: ......
Hanbei: ......
Rune: ...Um. So, why is nobody speaking?
Sophie: ——What did you say!?
Clark: Eh? You didn't know?

I was not the exceptional student that Elio is. I was merely sitting in on classes. Not enough to do anything exceptional.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_19_008","SpeakerName":"Maria","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/r0160","IconName":"r0160s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That's not true! Clark saved Maria. Clark is Maria's master!","sfxName":"r0160sx_story_010","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Clark","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0159","IconName":"h0159s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thank you, Maria. Now can you please let me go? I think I'm suffocating...","sfxName":"h0159sx_story_022","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Looks like she's squeezed your face into another shape...can't tell if she wants to protect you or kill you...","sfxName":"t3191c3_story_006","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_20_002","SpeakerName":"Clark","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0159","IconName":"h0159s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Basically, as I was repairing her I accidentally started her up.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_20_003","SpeakerName":"Clark","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0159","IconName":"h0159s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Since she was reset, she has no memories of the past. Plus, getting rid of her is a bit of a hassle. So...that's the way it is.","sfxName":"h0159sx_story_004","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Rune! Don't do that!","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_010","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm so sorry Maria, Rune doesn't mean anything by it. Your little bird isn't hurt, is it?","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_023","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Maria","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/r0160","IconName":"r0160s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Its name is Chu Chu. Is Chu Chu hurt?","sfxName":"r0160sx_story_003_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Clark","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0159","IconName":"h0159s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Maria, let me take a look.","sfxName":"h0159sx_story_028_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Rune","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0151","IconName":"h0151s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I did bad...I'm sorry.","sfxName":"h0151sx_story_028","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Clark","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0159","IconName":"h0159s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's okay. The Rune bird I made may be simple, but it shouldn't break that easily.","sfxName":"h0159sx_story_006","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_205_001_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Clark","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0159","IconName":"h0159s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Maria, there are a lot of people here.
